name: Raise Morale
simpleDescription: Allies in the Cannon Barrage gain <speed>bonus Move Speed</speed>.

passives.name: Raise Morale
passives.effects: {{ci|Gangplank|Gangplank}} and his allies within {{ai|Cannon Barrage|Gangplank|Gangplank}} gain 40% bonus movement speed, which persists for 2 seconds after leaving the area.
